website_summaries.verdict: Nontoxic stain remover that only requires a few drops to remove tough stains.
pros: Only requires a drop or 2 to remove stains with no scrubbing required
Even removes old stains while still being gentle on fabrics
cons: Some received leaky bottles upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great with Stains
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes my clothes come out of the dryer with what seems like grease stains on them. Nothing ever gets these stains out. Someone had mentioned this spot remover, so I decided to try it. The first time I used it, it worked wonders! The set in, dried in, stains came right out the first time. I put some solution on the stain and rubbed it in. I let it sit on the stain overnight and washed as normal. When I pulled the clothes out of the dryer, the stains were gone! Definitely love this spot remover!!
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It cleaned 35 year old set in stains! Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best spot remover in the world! It will remove just about everything from your fabric! I even used it for a very old doily that was so discolored and stained that I almost threw them away. All the old stains and knitted portion was over 15 years since it had never been washed. It is bright and clean & white now.... it used to look brown. It was handmade by my dear departed Aunt made 35+ years ago! It's ready for framing now!
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for leaky bottles!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this product. It’s the absolute BEST at removing any stains from garments. HOWEVER, this 3-pack had one bottle where the lid wasn’t even finger-tight. The 3 bottles come sealed in a shipping pouch, and upon opening it, the pouch was full of liquid and the 3 bottles were soaked in the soapy solution. Had to rinse all three bottles off, and one was half full. Ineligible for return or claim, so I guess I’m out a half a bottle. Love the product, but less than impressed with shipping. Simply checking the lids before bundling into 3-packs would have saved this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Audley Adrian

customer_reviews.title: but we fell in LOVE with this product
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a small bottle of this at Hobby Lobby as a joke for my husband, but we fell in LOVE with this product! We've been using it for over a year now and have never met a stain that it couldn't handle! With 2 young boys and 2 adventurous dogs, we have been through just about every stain remover out there and none of them compare to this. My only complaint is that they don't make bigger bottles of it!
customer_reviews.author: FosterFam51

customer_reviews.title: Grandma's Saves the Day!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome stain remover product I have ever used! It removes so many stains that were previously impossible to completely remove. For stains I have any doubt about, I do not place the item in the dryer. If the stain is not completely removed I repeat the process a second time and that nearly always works. I have saved some of my favorite clothes using Grandma's! Each of my grandchildren will be receiving a bottle of Grandma'a from me when they leave for college this fall!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to take a stain out of our comforter. I had soaked it and washed it but it was still there. After seeing so many good reviews on this stuff I figured I would try it. I put it on the stain (which had been washed and dried before), let it sit and when washed it again. The stain was gone! I was thinking I needed to buy a new comforter, the stain bugged me so much, so this stuff saved me a bunch of money. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Spot remover
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that there were no stains the product will NOT get rid off. I'm not sure what kind of stains they were talking about, dirt maybe. My experience over a few month has been that there was NO ONE stain the product got rid off. Soap was better then this.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Lucente Stabile

customer_reviews.title: Ten Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: It took a few applications for complete removal of red wine on a white sweatshirt, and I did put a little dawn dish detergent in the washing machine, but it removed the red wine 100%!!! I’m not sure I’ve EVER heard of red wine being completely removed from white fabric before!!! ... also, red wine out of beige carpet, completely removed as well!! Interestingly enough, it does turn the red wine blue first, which I thought was strange, but who cares!!! I Super Highly Recommend this product!!! (I wish I had taken a before pic of the carpet, but hopefully the after pic will speak for itself).
customer_reviews.author: KatieLady682

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Ruined two pairs of pants! Followed instructions carefully but it stained my pants as it removed not only the stain but the dye of the fabric as well. I had to throw them out. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stain remover that has worked on nearly every stain I've needed to remove, albeit with some scrubbing for some stubborn stains. I got this 3-pack because I use it weekly on my toddler's mystery stains from preschool. I'll keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it and recommend it
customer_reviews.text: we had a water softener for 30 years... had to move to a condo and can't have one here. the water is so hard and I was so shocked to see what hard water does to our clothes.. this is the only thing I have found that takes out every stain.. I haven't had one so far it couldn't handle.. LOVE it and recommend it. god price.. fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie gowing

customer_reviews.title: Pinocchio
customer_reviews.text: LIES, LIES AND MORRREEEE LIES. This DOE NOT take ink off things. Don't waste your money and when you truly find something that works PLEASE tag me.
customer_reviews.author: mayoli

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT PURCHASE AGAIN, updated formula is TOXIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: I am revising my review (from 5 stars to 2), based on changes in product formulation. The first bottles of this stain remover I purchased from Amazon clearly labeled the product as NON-TOXIC and BIODEGRADABLE (picture attached). That formula was the best stain remover EVER, got rid of grease, ink, mustard, etc. However, the newer (3) bottles of this stain remover have a Prop 65 warning on the label, and indicate that the product is a skin and eye irritant. Had I noticed this I would not have bought the product, no matter how well it works. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to great reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it got great reviews, but I was sorely disappointed with the results. It did not take out the stains I thought it would. Worst of all I paid full price and only received like 3/4 of the product. The packaging sucks! The bottles leaked during the shipping process, so I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a little tiny weird looking bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical. I bought this expecting nothing. Ended up using it on a 2-year-old (coffee perhaps?) stain on a fabric ottoman that my wife was just about ready to divorce me over. BAM! stain gone. Can't explain it, don't want to explain it. Saved my marriage, joking but not really.....Magic. Try it. Only issue is the fabric seems rougher after treatment not sure if its the cleaner or the scrubbing I did to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: goodtimes

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: Nothing, literally nothing, works like this stuff! There is no trick or hack that will gets stains out like this stuff. I discovered this on amazon and it is my saving grace! 2 YEARS AGO I stained one of my favorite tank tops with LIQUID FOUNDATION and I just kept it because it was my favorite. When I got this stuff I though, hey why not try it on the top. I tried it out and I kid you not the stain came out, IT CAME OUT! That’s literally impossible, like what?! I tell everyone about this stuff, it’s magical.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Ehr

customer_reviews.title: Used on pen ink for OCPs, worked fine
customer_reviews.text: I messed up and threw my OCPs (military uniform) into the washer with pens still in the arm pocket. I got a huge ink stain on the sleeve of my top and went ahead and bought this stain remover. It didnt work at first, when I dab a bit on the top of the stain. It did however start working once I opened up the pen hole a little bit and dribble a ton into the slit. I did started rubbing the stained spot together and BAM, it starting coming out. A HUGE blob of ink is now a tiny little spot, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lideth Delvalle

customer_reviews.title: Leaked out
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but it had leaked all over. The 3 were wrapped together and all three bottles had the liquid stain remover all over them. It was a mess. I could not see where I could contact the seller regarding this. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible stain remover
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible, it's removed stains that I accidently washed and dried without treating. My boyfriend, God love him, spills stuff on himself constantly. Mostly greasy stuff like food and whatever grease is on motor parts. Haven't found anything this hasn't removed. The spray works just as well as the little bottle applicators, so buy depending on how you prefer to treat stains.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing and I was thrilled to think I finally found a stain remover that would work on everyday kid messes.... well it didn’t take a single stain out of any of our clothes. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H.

customer_reviews.title: grandma you're back
customer_reviews.text: There's truth in "grandmothers" knew how to remove all sorts of spots & stains; and i'm referring to those grandmothers and now great grandmothers who are above 68 years old. "Grandma's Secret Spot Remover" is still the best kept secret on the market. I've been using it for years and gave it to my mom who's 91 to try it. She loved it too. What all the other spot removers are able to clean "grandma's" removes the spots the other brands can't.
customer_reviews.author: VasiKing

customer_reviews.title: WHOA! .. THIS STUFF WORKS LIKE A CHARM...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried it on all stains... food, grease, motor oil, grass, whatever. It works on everything. It's nice and thick so I use a lot less than the Carbona stuff, plus I don't have to buy different stain removers for different applications. I accidentally left it sit on two shirts for a couple of days before washing them... no problem with the color and the stains still came out. Will definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Grieco Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Spot Remover
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I had several oil spots on the front of a Carhart T shirt that had been washed and dried many times. I tried Shout on the oil spots twice and they did get lighter but they were still very visible. I put a few drops of the Granda’s spot remover on each oil spot and put the shirt in the dirty clothes hamper overnight. I washed it the next morning and the spots are gone. Great spot remover.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the hype is with this, this didn't work or any stains I had
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Barry

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing results using this product. A total waste of money. Tried it on grease stains and it did literally nothing.
customer_reviews.author: William Chapman

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. It works better than anything I've tried for stubborn stains if used as directed. Blood, grease, grass, lipstick etc., Happy to see it available here because I was having trouble finding in the store. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8AuntLo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: it unfortunately did not work for me. i tried getting some sharpie stains out of my sheets & i've come to terms with the fact that im just going to have to buy new sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use, but it need some time to remove stains.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use. I just wet my bed sheet and put it on the spots of my sheets. Then waiting for 5-10 minutes, I try to use my hand to make it clean. While it is failed to remove those spots clearly. I tried three times, and finally I put my whole sheet into the wash machine. After dying, I found there is still uncleared stain remained on my sheet. which is not very satisfied me. I hold this product can clean spots once time. Hopes! Maybe I have to try another time.
customer_reviews.author: Livia

customer_reviews.title: Stain Remover Left a Stain
customer_reviews.text: This left a dark spot on my all white couches so that's great... I even tried testing it beforehand but had a lot of confidence in this product based on the reviews and its disappointed GREATLY.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Removes set in blood and drink stains!
customer_reviews.text: My son cut his head and of course blood went all over his shirt. He also spilled some sort of pink drink down the front of his shirt earlier that day. After a long trip to the hospital and forgetting about the stain. I found the shirt a few days later and thought it was ruined. I applied Grandma’s Secret Spot Remover and let it soak in for 15 minutes before tossing the shirt in the wash. I cannot believe that every single bit of all the stains were gone with the FIRST application of the spot remover.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael V

customer_reviews.title: Best product to remove even set in stains.  Don't believe the comments that day otherwise!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a while back and ran out so ordered from Amazon this time. This gets the stains out even after they're set from being washed and dried. I did use it twice in a row on one outfit, but didn't dry the first time. I was pleased it removed the chocolate stains nicely from granddaughters shirt and pants.
customer_reviews.author: Designing Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Spot Remover
customer_reviews.text: I have had no improvement since using this product and am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donaldine G Leveler

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: By far the best stain remover I have ever used. I've been using this for years and have never found anything to compare to how effective it is at removing stains. Works on easy stains like coffee or food, also works on difficult stains on clothing like tar. Ive never had it discolor any fabric I've ever used it on. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it didn’t smell chemically and more like citrus. It helped take out some stains but it ended up staining one of my pants because I forgot to wash it right away. Most likely user error. Do not leave the solution on overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Pot of speghetti sauce almost dropped and quite a bit sloshed onto my kitchen rug. This stuff got it out. Took two applications and some scrubbing but it got out SPEGHETTI sauce! And we didn't tackle it until the next morning bc it was a dinner party. My husband, who usually prefers I curtail my Amazon addiction specifically asked me to order more of this.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed this product didn’t work well with the stains on my clothes. After reading all the positive reviews on this product, I decided to give it a try. I spilt some buffalo sauce on my white pants and have tried using the stain remover 4 times now and still present.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: How did I not know this was out there? Best thing since sliced bread! I had a friend look at a valance I had and she had an orange marker in her hand. It was on white material. She said "oh, that was there"....NOT. So the marker stain was there for several weeks until my neighbor gave me this and low and behold it came out almost instantly with very little effort. Found it online and ordered the 3 pk.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Good stain remover
customer_reviews.text: I love this spot remover and have used it for years. I use this for most stains. If I think they stain is particularly stubborn (dirty oil/grease, etc) I add a bit of dawn dishwashing soap to the stain as well. I have taken out a lot of stubborn stains with this stuff. Buying several of these bottles at a time is handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: BarbB

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! It got rid of oil from Chinese food I had. I was devastated because I had only worn the pants a few times and washing it didn’t do anything, so I went on amazon to look for a product that might help. I am so glad I tried this. I placed a small amount on my pants, rubbed it briefly, and let it sit for 30 minutes before throwing it in the washer. I was very skeptical but to my surprise the stain was nowhere to be found!! It’s a miracle product. I wish I had known this product earlier in my life. It would have saved many of my clothing items.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: The best stain remover
customer_reviews.text: My sister introduced me to this and it is incredible. She is a veterinarian and found it to be effective in removing a variety of stains that come with that territory. I love it because it can even get out a stain even after an item has been washed and dried. Perfect for getting out greasy spots and food stains. Doesn't need any setting time either, just put a bit on and then throw it in the wash. A little bit goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic.
customer_reviews.text: Best spot remover I have ever tried! Tough on spots, gentle on fabric. It has removed all spots I have used it on. Specially those grease ones that I thought had ruined my silk blouse.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Tomato stains GONE!
customer_reviews.text: Have used Granny’s several times , all with good results. But topper was couple days ago dumped plate of spaghetti sauce on large room run. Tomato stain was large & visible. Squirted bottle of Granny’s on it and began wiping with clean raps. Slowly but surely all stain removed. Amazing! Never would have thought anything would get such a stain out.
customer_reviews.author: Southfork2020

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work like I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this stuff, I read every review. I got it mostly for the greasy stains you get on shirts and don’t know they are there until you wash them. It didn’t get them out which was depressing. I apparently spill a lot of food on myself. I will keep hunting for a great stain remover.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Super spot remover
customer_reviews.text: So far this spot remover does what it advertises! I have used it to remove blood and grass stains so far. Pretreat is recommended. Since this came in a 3 pack, I will probably be sharing one with my brother, who has 2 "stainmakers" at home.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Basham

customer_reviews.title: It really does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I was told by a woman who works in a thrift store that she has a lot of spot cleaning to do before putting some goods out for sale. She finds this magical for cleaning up, I could not believe it - but it has worked very well for me too - it removes fruit stains and all sorts of odd marks from clothes. I am glad I learned about this spot remover.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna du Pree

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, not worth a penny
customer_reviews.text: Came with leaky bottles. No response from seller. Hasn't gotten out a single stain. Complete waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Works for some stuff
customer_reviews.text: Took some stains out, seems to work randomly for me. I bought it for my upholstery in my car and it didn't do much for the seats, but it did wonders for the ceiling area in my car that had old coffee stains from a car accident 4 years ago so that's cool! Good for kid clothing stains.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for removing just about any kind of stain. It goes on kind of thick, rub it on the stain, let it sit for about 15 minutes or so, and then wash the item as usual. Pretty much has taken out any stain I throw it at, even after previous washings.
customer_reviews.author: Adjuster Jim

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff! There is not a stain I have not been able to remove with it. Grease stains that have been washed and dried, rust, car grease, etc. It takes care of it all. No rubbing or scrubbing. Just let it soak in. For harsh stains I douse the stain and let it sit over night until it dries and then put it in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Seyfried

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love my hubs, but he can be messy. He's always spilling something on his shirt. There have been times before I found this product that other stain removers would not work, and I would end up throwing his shirt out. Not any more!! This remover gets grease, wine, oil and blood out of our clothing. It's like the miracle stain remover. I highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C V

customer_reviews.title: Best spot remover ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best spot remover I have ever used! I highly recommend and will buy over and over again. Products I used never would get things clean I threw so many clothes away before I found this! I use it so much (I cook a lot, so I get things on me all the time). I recommend this highly. It literally takes drops to clean a stain!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Dawn Parent

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful because it CAN leave a bleach-like stain in some clothing. I've only had that happen a couple times and have been using this product quite often and had a lot of success removing stains that were otherwise hard to remove! I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great little spot and stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like a charm. In fact, I gave a bottle to my mom and sister, and they loved it. I've used it on deeply reduced priced clothing items at rummage sales and have had great success with it. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: minimammoth

customer_reviews.title: Best spot Cleaner, Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This spot cleaner is fantastic! While on a Girlfriend trip recently, a friend spilt red wine on a beautiful, expensive top. This spot cleaner took it right out. We let it sit for awhile and then washed the top in cold water. No wine spot! I used it to take a coffee spot out of a white shirt. No coffee spot! Fantastic.!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tillman

customer_reviews.title: It is the BEST stain remover
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product on the market to remove stains. As a quilter it was always handy in case of an accident with a needle prick or if you were using an old piece of fabric with a stain. I can’t say enough about this product. Buy it you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Rojolo

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles :(
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this 3 pack because the product is amazing, but, 2 of the 3 plastic bottles are cracked and leaking the solution. Not going to bother returning them, but am a bit irritated. This same thing happened with a different plastic bottle product I purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Really Works
customer_reviews.text: My Mom used to use this stuff and I was glad to find it and get some. The price is reasonable and the stuff really works! Because this comes as a three-pack, I got some as gifts for the family too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My children spilled blue paint in my brown carpet, no amount of deep cleaning with a carpet cleaner was working. One week later we got this and it got 90%of the paint out of the carpet, like at first glance it is a normal looking carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Can get out set stains
customer_reviews.text: This product usually gets rid of even set-in stains if you leave it on for 15-20 minutes before washing. I like that you can “outline” the stain, not over-using the product. A mainstay in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: J. crawford

customer_reviews.title: Created more stains
customer_reviews.text: This created more stains. It's like pouring olive oil on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Allie D

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised! It worked!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after reading several reviews. My 12 year old was eating when she got grease all over her brand new light pink favorite hoodie. I washed and dried it not knowing it had been stained. Once I received the remover I followed the instructions. Placed a small amount on the 3 grease stains and rubbed it in. It was easy to you. The right consistency and to my surprise it worked!!!!! I have 4 daughters and a husband who never worries about getting clothes stained. Now with this product neither do I.
customer_reviews.author: Donnery

customer_reviews.title: As a mom I was in need of a great stain remover
customer_reviews.text: And I love this stuff!! I will continue to buy this because of the stains it removed! I followed the instructions and scrubbed the spot treatment in with a wet wash cloth and as soon as it came out of the dryer the stain was completely GONE!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed so far. Took me forever if spotting and respotting to get a small mark of ink pen out and then it removed the color from the clothing so now it has a bigger stain. Should’ve just left the ink spot. It was only a dot.
customer_reviews.author: amy d

customer_reviews.title: Was happy to find this on Amazon as my local store ...
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to find this on Amazon as my local store stopped carrying it. I am famous for dropping stuff on my chest and if used within a reasonable amount of time almost all stains are removed. It is worth washing shortly after getting the stain. (Like that night) I have used it after a few days and it has worked but not all the time, however it works better than anything else I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRoro

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT work.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed after reading all the great reviews!!! I used it on a blood stain and another unknown (inky?) stain. Neither item had been dried in the dryer after stain was found. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: NetaB

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magical!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magical! It’s super easy to use, and it works on almost any stain! My daughter made fluffy slime today, and by the time she was done, there was purple fluffy slime all over her dress. I scrubbed it with this stain remover, and threw it in the wash thinking there’s no way the stains will get out. I was pleasantly surprised when I pulled the dress out, and there wasn’t a single remnant of the slime on it. It was a laundry miracle! Love this stuff and will continue to use it for everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, not taking off all the stains
customer_reviews.text: It works but not on everything. My daughter had paint (washable) kind on her socks And it didnt take it off, she had starwberry and mango stains which also were not completely removed. This works for minor stains but its not completely taking off all the stains.
customer_reviews.author: nikip

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good. I used as directed but it left a little ring on my blouse. That’s why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took the stain out
customer_reviews.text: My mother passed away 12-4-19 at the age of 99. I was her care giver for 13years. She had appliqued a quilt and donated it for a drawing. She did this when she was 93. I tried to buy the quilt from the lady who won it but she knew mom and would not sell it. After mom died she gave it to me. There we a few stains on it so I got the quilt wash and stain remover and washed it and it looks like new. Thank you. My granddaughter will get the quilt next.`
customer_reviews.author: christine Hoegler

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stain remover in a little bottle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great spot remover. Works great on all organic stains I have had to deal with. Even gets out blood stains that have been washed and dried. Drop it on and rub into the stain. It can be washed right away or left for a time before washing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mazalan

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my carpet and clothes. seems to get most if not all stains out
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: It works,,, not the magical spot remover its billed as
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works. NO, it isn't the magical spot remover its being billed as. How they got such a great buzz going is an accomplishment. It is the only amazon item I remember seeing with 5 stars. UPDATE-the bottles leak.
customer_reviews.author: exconsul

customer_reviews.title: like this product
customer_reviews.text: easy to apply, good for greasy spots, not always perfect on the tough spots but gentle, good for the colored clothes - does not bleach or leave any trace marks after washing
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana S

customer_reviews.title: Creates oily marks, doesn't remove stain
customer_reviews.text: I've had a bottle of Grandma's previously and it worked very well to get out tough stain spots. This order of Grandma's is not working the same. It doesn't remove the stain and it leaves an oily mark. Maybe this is a fake. Maybe they changed their formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for your money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great !! It took all of the stains out of my scrubs in one wash. You only use a little bit on the stain and it works wonders. Definitely worth it. I will be ordering more !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this hasn’t removed stains from my husband’s shirt where he dropped soup all down the front of it, or grass stain from his jeans. Used it a second time on the shirt, stains still there.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: gets anything out
customer_reviews.text: it can anything out. I accidently spilled a bowl of melted butter all over my favorite skirt. I used this and it all came out. Which was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best Stain Removal!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is AMAZING!!!!! My mom recommended it and so far it’s taken out every stain on my clothes. Old stains like grease on shirts have disappeared! Buy it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Betzy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used a few sprays and a toothbrush on white shoes. It got some of the dirt off but not the stains. I haven’t washed them in the washing machine yet too see if it would be better but I was hoping I could spray wipe and go but I couldn’t tell a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Janiece Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, crappy shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! Stains are no match against it. With that being said they really need to figure out a way to seal the bottles because I only ended up with 2.5 bottles because the 3rd leaked everywhere in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Omg it works
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product on a couple items and it really works lipstick on a handbag old shoe stains it’s really cleared it up happy they came in a set of three
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They work so well!! Perfect especially for baby clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela draper

customer_reviews.title: All three bottles were leaking and covered in fluid
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before and I really like it. It’s removed many difficult stains. However, this package of three came in a plastic pouch inside a padded envelope. All three bottles were leaking, the tops were not screwed on tightly. I had to rinse each bottle because they were all covered in Grandma’s secret remover. I’m not sure how many ounces remain in each bottle. Not sure why this happened.
customer_reviews.author: jody buller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with the advice from a friend. She swears by it. I was very disappointed that I didn't receive the same results as she had. Not sure I would invest in this product.
customer_reviews.author: MimiX3

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this stain remover for decades. It is an unbelievable stain remover. I am so glad Amazon carries it for an extremely reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie P.

customer_reviews.title: Baby poop remover
customer_reviews.text: Love this stain removing gel. Works better than the spray of the same brand. It is thick so it can be hard to get out of the bottle, therefore it is not great for large stains. Apply, rub in (I use a special labeled POOP toothbrush), let sit and throw in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kara G

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover around!
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked how well this stuff works. Between sauce stains and coffee spills....I’m very impressed with this product! Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Spots Gone
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and absolutely recommend it as the best ever spot remover. I bought bottles for all 6 of my kids and their families. Such a great gift. Ruby F
customer_reviews.author: Ruby F Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Best Spot Remover!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best spot remover out there. I used to purchase this at AC Moore and then they closed. So happy I found the product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover ever!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, just need a drop. I have used this product for years, it is great! It has removed greasy stains that have remained after washing and drying without removing the color. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Gets out even stains that went through the dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This gets out even stains that have gone through the dryer. It’s hard to squeeze out of the bottle, but the results are worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Joie McClements

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves these for cleaning church linens
customer_reviews.text: My wife cleans church linens, typically with some wine stains. These work very well when combined with a number of other cleaners she uses.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: WORKS BETTER THAN I EVER EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: IT REALLY DOES GET OUT NASTY STAINS AND GREASE! It's amazing. I use it as stocking stuffers every year. My kids always ask for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Carol V

customer_reviews.title: Best Stain Remover Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is notorious for dropping food on his shirt. Grandmas Secret Spot Remover is by far the best product I’ve ever used for stains, many of which I didn’t believe would ever come out. I’ve used this product for about 8 years now and have only had one item that it didn’t work on, red dye from a paper napkin. I even take one with me when going on vacation. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aruba girl

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Grandma’s secret is a must have for any household! It has saved so many of my clothes and sheets from oil and blood stains.
customer_reviews.author: Wdyy

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff! It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great as long as you follow directions! We always use it for baby poop stains and other misc. stains. First we rinse of residue in cold water, then apply gel, let it sit for at least 20 min, then wash in machine with cold water. Need to apply to stain as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: With Lifted Hands Co

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic! I took a pair of my daughters pants that had paint on it for almost 2 years and too it right out on the first try!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I'd do without Grandma's. There's nothing this can't remove. Been using it for years and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: Leaked out in envelope
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I ordered a 3 pk and all 3 bottles leaked during shipping. Probably lost about 1/2 a bottled worth of product.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia On My Mind

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These little bottles of magic have been very helpful getting out stubborn stains. It has worked on everything I'd tries it on.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta

product_meta.title: Grandma's Secret Spot Remover, 2 Ounce (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Spot Remover3 bottles of Grandma's; s secret spot remover for all your tough stain removal
feature_bullets: 3 bottles of grandma's Secret spot Remover for all your tough stain removal
Each bottle holds 2 ounces of Remover
Environmentally safe formula that biodegradable, nontoxic, and contains no chlorine or phosphates.
No need to scrub, just apply a drop. . . Won't harm your fabrics.
